bill_title: appropriate money to the South Dakota Energy Infrastructure Authority.
keywords: Department of Tourism and State Development

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to appropriate money to the South Dakota Energy Infrastructure Authority. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of five hundred thousand dollars ($ 500,000 ), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Department of Tourism and State Development to the South Dakota Energy Infrastructure Authority for the purpose of employing an executive director and staff and other administrative expenses. Section 2. The executive director of the South Dakota Energy Infrastructure Authority shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2008, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
